name: Skot Rockcrusher and the Secret Dwarven City
name_original: Skot Rockcrusher and the Secret Dwarven City
description:
You play as Skot Rockcrusher, a dwarven skater forced to mine in a quick point and click adventure to find your friends!

Matthew Tucciarone's entry for the Super Try Jam 2023! All the music is arranged by me and from Peer Gynt by Edvard Grieg.
